<!-- Report structure for capstone, edit with RStudio visual editor -->

+-------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Section           | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |

| **Abstract**      | Note that an Importance section is not required.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| *200--250 words*  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
+-------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Introduction**  | Introduce Saanich Inlet as a model ecosystem for studying microbial community responses to ocean deoxygenation e.g. seasonal cycles, relevant biogeochemistry, previous studies, etc.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| *500--750 words*  | Overview of a geochemical cycle including its global impacts, microbial foundations and involved genes.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
+-------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Methods**       | Briefly describe the data (sampling, sequencing, processing, etc.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| *300--500 words*  | Briefly describe your analysis methods including                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                   | -   TreeSAPP version and commands used                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                   | -   iTOL version                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                   | -   R version and packages used                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                   | -   Statistics (if applicable)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                   | Provide one single shell script and one single R script (i.e `treesapp_analysis.sh` and `treesapp_analysis.R`) as individual files (i.e. not as part of your manuscript) containing the complete code to generate your results.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
+-------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Results**       | Your analysis should address the [guiding research questions](#guiding-research-questions) you have developed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| *500--750 words*  | You must include ≥ 5 figures/panels with titles and full captions. These figures can be combined into multi-panel figures if desired.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
+-------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Discussion**    | Frame results within a broader discussion of Saanich Inlet (Apr 14 discussion).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| *750--1000 words* | Propose evolutionary, environmental, etc. reasoning for distributed metabolism as seen in the geochemcial pathway.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                   | Future directions                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
+-------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **References**    | Formatted in the ASM style such as for the [Journal of Bacteriology](https://jb.asm.org/content/organization-and-format). If you are using a reference manager, this style can be downloaded for [EndNote](https://endnote.com/style_download/american-society-for-microbiology-asm-journals-2/), [Mendeley](https://github.com/citation-style-language/styles/blob/master/american-society-for-microbiology.csl), or [Zotero](https://www.zotero.org/styles?q=microbiology). |
|                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| *10 or more*      | Make sure to include citations for the data source papers and software tools used!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
+-------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

: Report structure
